mapper.select: select t.code as xqCode,t.name as xqName,t.addr,t.memo,t.zdmj,t.jzmj,t.ldmj,t.dlmj,t.lysl,t.fzr,t.gsmc,t.frdb,t.lxr,t.lxdh,t.lxdz,t.ssgs,t.znj,t.cqts,t.sfatsf,t.xqlxdh ,t.sso_regionalcode,t.sso_code,t.status,t.create_by,t.create_date,t.update_by,t.update_date,t.remarks,wyi.wy_name as wyName from ht_xq_info as t inner join ht_xq_wy as wy on t.code=wy.xq_code inner join ht_wy_info as wyi on wy.wy_code=wyi.wy_code where t.code = #{xqCode}
